text: welcome to our Q&A video it's more of a
frequently asked questions and answer
thing so get straight into it and the
first question was why did you move to
Bangkok the main reason that we moved to
Bangkok was because that we had to leave
our house in Chiang Rai sooner than we
thought we technically should have lived
in in Chiang Rai in our house until
October which would have worked out
perfectly because that is when our
current visa would end as well but we
had to leave the house and we were then
faced with where do we go it's short
notice with Eden and it was Bangkok
Bangkok was the only place we could find
that was pet-friendly within the budget
that we could afford we could only
afford between seven and eight thousand
baht at the time and my parents were
coming so we were very busy planning
stuff and we didn't have much time to
search around so that's why we're here
another reason for choosing Bangkok over
anywhere else is because we haven't
covered this area in depth yet we've got
a lot of things that we wanted to make

month of daily vlogging we've also been
making these videos the next two videos
that will go up after this are the ones
that we made cost of living in Bangkok
and a things to do in Bangkok so keep an

do we bother to cook our own food why
don't we just eat street food all the
time
I think one of the main reasons that we

in what ingredients are going in exactly
sometimes we track what we eat and you
